meanings.definition: To watch over or supervise from a higher position.
meanings.sent1: The security guard will overwatch the building from the rooftop.
meanings.sent2: The parent overwatches the children playing in the park.
meanings.sent3: The eagle decided to overwatch the busy street from its nest.
meanings.sent4: The wise owl overwatches the forest, ensuring all creatures are safe.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse overwatches the ships at sea, guiding them to safety.

meanings.definition: A military tactic of providing cover and support from a vantage point.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers used overwatch to protect their comrades during the battle.
meanings.sent2: The sniper provided overwatch for the advancing troops.
meanings.sent3: The overwatch from the hill kept the enemy forces at bay.
meanings.sent4: The overwatch position allowed for a strategic advantage in the skirmish.
meanings.sent5: The overwatch team ensured the safety of the entire squad.

meanings.definition: A video game where players work together to achieve objectives.
meanings.sent1: In the overwatch game, teamwork is essential to win.
meanings.sent2: Players can choose different heroes in overwatch to suit their playstyle.
meanings.sent3: The overwatch match ended in a thrilling victory for the blue team.
meanings.sent4: The overwatch tournament attracted top gamers from around the world.
meanings.sent5: Overwatch requires quick reflexes and good communication among teammates.
